title: Summer Solstice Rest and Restore: Meditation and Acupuncture
description: Offering a holistic approach for individuals, groups and corporation for managing stress, illness and achieving work/life balance with mind/body modalities.
cleaned_text: Summer Solstice Rest and Restore: Meditation and Acupuncture SKU: $45.00 $45.00 Unavailable per item Celebrate the Summer Solstice and join Dr. Caroline Moody, licensed acupuncturist, and Trish Hart, CRYT 500 therapeutic Yoga Instructor, for a night combining the powerful modalities of acupuncture and meditation. This hour long session will give participants meditation tools to relax and restore while the acupuncture will help balance the nervous system. Date: Monday, June 19th Time : 6:00 - 7:00 PM Location: The Lyme and PANS Treatment Center, Cohasset MA Date: Monday, June 19th Time : 6:00 - 7:00 PM Location: The Lyme and PANS Treatment Center, Cohasset MA
